name: Paneer Tikka
description: Succulent cubes of paneer marinated in aromatic spices and grilled to perfection. A classic vegetarian delight.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Creamy spinach curry with soft paneer cubes. A nutritious and flavorful North Indian favorite.

name: Vegetable Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices. A festive one-pot meal.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, mixed vegetables, and cheese baked to golden perfection. A comforting Italian-inspired dish.

name: Vegetable Manchurian
description: Crispy vegetable dumplings tossed in a tangy and spicy sauce. An Indo-Chinese favorite.

name: Dal Tadka
description: Yellow lentils tempered with cumin, garlic, and aromatic spices. A protein-packed comfort food.

name: Aloo Gobi
description: Cauliflower and potatoes cooked with turmeric, cumin, and other spices. A classic North Indian dish.

name: Chana Masala
description: Chickpeas simmered in a spicy tomato-based sauce with onions and aromatic spices.

name: Cauliflower Rice Stir Fry
description: Riced cauliflower stir-fried with low-carb vegetables and your choice of protein.

name: Spinach Mushroom Stir-Fry
description: Fresh spinach and mushrooms saut√©ed with garlic and spices. A low-carb vegetarian delight.

name: Paneer Tikka (No Marinade)
description: Grilled paneer cubes seasoned with keto-friendly spices. A protein-rich vegetarian option.
